intro.title: It's time!
intro.wedding_coming_up: Our wedding is coming up and we are super excited.
intro.time_party: Time to party, this is wedding day!

practical_infos.shuttle_info_title: Enjoy the open bar; a shuttle will take you where you need to go
practical_infos.shuttle_info_content_1: A shuttle will pick-up everyone up from La Clusaz city center at 3:30pm and bring you to our ceremony (4pm in a field somewhere) and then reception (5pm at Les Rhodos.)
practical_infos.shuttle_info_content_2: Between 11pm and 3am the shuttle will make regular trips between Les Rhodos and La Clusaz.
practical_infos.parking_title: Wait but ... where do I park?
practical_infos.parking_content_1: The easiest option is to leave your car at the
practical_infos.parking_content_2: It's a 2min walk to get to the bus meeting point and it's free.
practical_infos.plan_pickup: Bus pick up in La Clusaz

hike_the_tmb.title: Come Hike with us!
hike_the_tmb.location: The French, Swiss and Italian Alps

map_table_tmb.title: Hike as much or as little as you want !

tmb-page.title: What gear should you bring ?
tmb-page.tent: Tent (to discuss to minimize the number of tents)
tmb-page.sleeping-bag: Sleeping bag (ideally confort temp 0deg Celsius, or below)
tmb-page.trash-bag: Trash bags (to put your stuff if it rains)
tmb-page.stove: Stove & Gas (to discuss, we should be able to share)
tmb-page.recommended-hiking-bag: First thing first, you need a backpack. For the people camping we recommend 70-90L. For refuger, 30-40L should be plenty.
